author: Sarah Shamim
title: Has Trump put off joining the Israel-Iran conflict for two weeks?
description: Trump appeared to delay US action on Iran for two weeks on Thursday, but is it just a negotiation tactic?
content:
United States President Donald Trump will decide Washingtons course of action in relation to the Israel-Iran conflict in two weeks time, the White House said on Thursday.
Speculation has been rising… [+6995 chars]
